mapper.select: SELECT sk.Id, pro.shp_mch shpmch, ma.shxm_mch shxmmch, mv.shxzh_mch shxzhmch, mv.shxzh sxz, sk.kcdz adress, pro.shp_tp img, sk.jg price FROM t_mall_sku sk, t_mall_sku_attr_value mav, t_mall_attr ma, t_mall_value mv, t_mall_product pro WHERE mav.sku_id = sk.Id AND mav.shxm_id = ma.Id AND mav.shxzh_id = mv.Id AND mav.shp_id = pro.Id and pro.flbh1=#{id} GROUP BY pro.shp_mch
SELECT tmtm.ppmch, tmtm.url FROM t_mall_tm_class tmtc, t_mall_trade_mark tmtm WHERE tmtc.pp_id = tmtm.Id and tmtc.flbh1 = #{id}
SELECT sk.id, sk.sku_xl, pro.shp_mch shpmch, sk.jg price, pro.shp_tp img, pro.shp_msh msh FROM t_mall_sku sk, t_mall_product pro WHERE sk.shp_id = pro.Id and sk.Id=#{id}
